Publication Type: pirates

Description: A motley group of three survivors, Jack Foster (builder), Foxy Jones (traffic warden) and Mike Bacon (always hungry boy scout), rallied to defend against the invasion of the rebel dead. Hiding from zombies in abandoned buildings, they erected barricades and organize the trap, and in extreme cases, take up arms and fight the zombies. Try to repel the invasion of zombies in the fight alone or with friends together in split screen mode. Dead Block - arcade game with a third person with a unique blend of action, humor, strategy and ... zombies. Players waiting for ten single-player cooperative multiplayer and eight levels, during which they will defend themselves from the crowds of ghouls. Fight the enemy will not only with weapons, but using different traps.

Features:
- Humorous gameplay, blending the elimination of tactical and zombie protection;
- Ability to eliminate the zombies with unusual and entertaining ways: unique set traps, use sneaky tactics, the use of smart bombs and melee weapons.
- Tactical protective gameplay: Protection from zombies by building blockades, gathering resources, and switching between all with 3 characters.
